claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

extracted_evidence.quote: Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax. HD-IIV4 was High Dose Fluzone, RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly identifies RIV4 as Flublok, establishing the product name relevant to the claim about its production platform.

extracted_evidence.quote: c RIV4: Flublok. c SD-IIV4: Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote again clarifies that RIV4 refers to Flublok, which is necessary to connect subsequent statements about RIV4 to Flublok.

extracted_evidence.quote: Two large studies have explored rVE of recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote describes RIV4 as a 'recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine,' directly supporting the claim that Flublok (RIV4) is produced using recombinant technology.
